title: Chinese state-linked paper lashes out at Elon Musk over lab leak theory
description: A Chinese state-run media outlet has issued a word of warning to Elon Musk: Be careful about how you talk about China.

title: Federal proposals could help domestic violence victims protect phone data
description: New rules proposed by the Federal Communications Commission could make it easier for victims of domestic violence to keep their phone data out of the hands of their abusers and maintain connections to friends, family and advocates who can offer help.

title: McCarthy calls Jan. 6 riot footage a Tucker Carlson 'exclusive' and says public will have video 'soon'
description: House Speaker Kevin McCarthy defended his decision to hand over tens of thousands of hours of security video from Jan. 6 to Fox News host Tucker Carlson.

title: What is consciousness? ChatGPT and advanced AI might redefine our answer
description: ChatGPT and other new chatbots are so good at mimicking human interaction that they’ve prompted a question among some: Is there any chance they’re conscious?

title: TikTok users say 'bold glamour' filter is 'terrifyingly realistic'
description: The new “bold glamour” TikTok filter is impressive — but many viewers feel unsettled by how “terrifyingly realistic” the subtle facial enhancements look.

title: FTX ex-engineering chief Nishad Singh pleads guilty to criminal charges
description: FTX ex-engineering head Nishad Singh pleaded guilty to criminal charges in New York on Tuesday, becoming the latest member of Sam Bankman-Fried’s former leadership team to agree to a deal.

title: Dish Network confirms network outage was a cybersecurity breach
description: Dish Network confirmed on Tuesday that a previously disclosed “network outage” was the result of a cybersecurity breach.

title: Savannah Guthrie tests positive for Covid during live 'TODAY' broadcast
description: Savannah Guthrie tested positive for Covid on Tuesday, prompting her to leave "TODAY" during the morning broadcast.

title: New Florida bill aims to limit legal protections for news media
description: A Florida bill introduced last week would make it easier to successfully sue news media for defamation, with several provisions that defy landmark Supreme Court rulings on First Amendment rights.

title: White House gives federal agencies 30 days to remove TikTok from all government devices
description: The White House is giving federal agencies 30 days to wipe TikTok off all government devices, as the Chinese-owned social media app comes under increasing scrutiny.

title: ‘Take It Down:’ a tool for teens to remove explicit images
description: “Once you send that photo, you can’t take it back,” goes the warning to teenagers, often ignoring the reality that many teens send explicit images of themselves under duress, or without understanding the consequences.
